entry.title: Three Thousand Stitches by Ms. Sudha Murty

link.title: Three Thousand Stitches by Ms. Sudha Murty

entry.summary: Book Type : ebook Link : goodreads Read Date : 2022-Feb-22nd Author : Ms. Sudha Murty Rating : ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Recommended by : _rad_iance_ Review Simple, genuine, and inspiring stories from the bits and bytes of Ms. Sudha Murty’s life experiences make a good read. She is known for her writing style, which makes her stories simple to read. She speaks directly with the minds of us, ...
